price: Allah vodu s neba spušta i njome život mrtvoj zemlji vraća! To je, zaista, dokaz za ljude koji hoće da čuju.
arabic: وَٱللَّهُ أَنزَلَ مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ فَأَحۡيَا بِهِ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ بَعۡدَ مَوۡتِهَآۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَسۡمَعُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wal-lahu anzala mina al-samāi māan fa-aḥyā bihi al-arḍa baʿda mawtihā inna fī dhālika laāyatan liqawmin yasmaʿūna
